message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_CANCELED
message.locale: The specified Screening Configuration is canceled.
The specified Screening Configuration is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: No Screening Configuration name was specified.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_FV_HOMEPAGE_IDENTIFIER_SHORT
message.locale: The specified homepage identifier is shorter than the minimum length of %1n.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SCREENING_CONFIGURATION_OVERLAP
message.locale: The proposed Screening Configuration conflicts with %1n other Screening Configuration for the dates and name specified.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_ASSESSMENT_CANCELED_NO_ADD
message.locale: The Assessment Configuration cannot be added for this Screening Configuration because the Assessment Configuration is Canceled.
The Assessment Configuration cannot be added for this Screening Configuration because the Assessment Configuration is Cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_ASSESSMENT_STARTDATE_LATER
message.locale: The specified start date is before the Assessment Configuration start date.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_ASSESSMENT_ENDDATE_EXIST
message.locale: You must specify an end date on or before %1d.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_ASSESSMENT
message.locale: The end date specified is after the end date of the Assessment Configuration.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_STARTDATE_AFTER_SCREENING_ENDDATE
message.locale: The start date specified is after the Screening Configuration end date.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SCREENING_CANCELED_NO_ADD
message.locale: The Screening Configuration cannot have Assessment Configurations added because the Screening Configuration is Canceled.
The Screening Configuration cannot have Assessment Configurations added because the Screening Configuration is Cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_ASESSMENT_STARTDATE_EARLY
message.locale: The Assessment cannot start before the Screening Configuration.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SCREENING_STARTDATE_EARLY
message.locale: The Screening cannot start before %1d.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SCREENING_ASSESSMENT_OVERLAP
message.locale: The proposed Assessment for this Screening Configuration conflicts with %1n other Assessments on this Screening Configuration.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SCREENING_ASSESSMENT_CANCELED
message.locale: The Assessment on this Screening Configuration is canceled.
The Assessment on this Screening Configuration is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_ASSESSMENT_EXISTS_BEFORE_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Assessment Configuration has been used in %1n assessments before the new start date.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SAC_EXISTS_OUTSIDE_DATES
message.locale: This Assessment Configuration is currently in use by %1n Screening Configurations.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XFV_ENDDATE_BEFORE_STARTDATE
message.locale: The specified start date was after the specified end date.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_FV_STARTDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: No start date was specified.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_FV_STARTDATE_IN_PAST
message.locale: The specified start date is in the past.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_FV_ENDDATE_IN_PAST
message.locale: The specified end date is in the past.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SAC_OUTSIDE
message.locale: There are %1n active Assessment on this Screening Configuration starting before or ending after the date range provided.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SAC_ACTIVE
message.locale: There are %1n active Assessments used on this Screening Configuration.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_XRV_SCREENINGCASE_OUTSIDE
message.locale: There are %1n Screening Cases starting before or ending after the provided date range.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_XRV_SCREENINGCASE
message.locale: There are %1n Screening Cases of the Screening Configuration provided.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_SCREENING_ENDDATE_EXIST
message.locale: You must specify an end date on or before %1d.

message.name: ERR_SCREENING_CONFIG_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_SCREENING
message.locale: The end date specified is after the end date of the Screening Configuration.
